tool_description: The Zelda API is a cool open-source API that provides information about the greatest game franchise out there: The Legend of Zelda. This API is open, so it doesn't require an API key to use it. Also, please give us a star on our official GitHub repository, and feel free to post issues there.
name: The Legend of Zelda
title: The Legend of Zelda

api_list.name: List of The Legend of Zelda games
api_list.description: This route fetches the list of the released The Legend of Zelda games and outputs that in JSON format. The user can define his own pagination and also use search queries to find the desired output.

api_list.name: Staff
api_list.description: This route fetches a list of all the people that worked on the Legend of Zelda games and outputs that in JSON format. The user can define his own pagination and also use search queries to find the desired output.

api_list.name: Characters Route
api_list.description: This route fetches a list of all the characters that can be encountered in the Legend of Zelda games, and outputs that in JSON format. The user can define his own pagination and also use search queries to find the desired output.

api_list.name: Monsters Route
api_list.description: This route fetches a list of all the monsters that can be encountered in the Legend of Zelda games, and outputs that in JSON format. The user can define his own pagination and also use search queries to find the desired output.

api_list.name: Bosses Route
api_list.description: This route fetches a list of all the bosses that can be encountered in the Legend of Zelda games, and outputs that in JSON format. The user can define his own pagination and also use search queries to find the desired output.

api_list.name: Dungeons Route
api_list.description: This route fetches a list of all the dungeons that can be encountered in the Legend of Zelda games, and outputs that in JSON format. The user can define his own pagination and also use search queries to find the desired output.

api_list.name: Places Route
api_list.description: This route fetches a list of all the places that can be encountered in the Legend of Zelda games, and outputs that in JSON format. The user can define his own pagination and also use search queries to find the desired output.

api_list.name: Items Route
api_list.description: This route fetches a list of all the items that can be encountered in the Legend of Zelda games, and outputs that in JSON format. The user can define his own pagination and also use search queries to find the desired output.
